(I live in the yellow region, you live in the light blue one.)

Hungary has humid continental climate, which is not acceptable for growing such fruit because of high chance of fungal diseases.

South of Dinarides pomegranates grow well, but the plants really likes dry climate. This summer was quite damp, so the harvest will probably be close to pathetic.
